project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and desired output unit
Handle input validation for user inputs to ensure correct values are provided
Write tests for each conversion function and the command-line interface
Execute tests to verify the correctness of conversion calculations and user interface interaction
